title: Visory Health: Rx Savings App
description:
Save on your Rx prescriptions with Visory Health – your FREE pharmacy discount card! Unlock savings on your prescriptions by showing our easy-to-use card, no coupons to clip, or registration necessary.

The Visory Health prescription savings app is perfect for everyone looking to save on medications for themselves, their family, and even their pets. Our discount card covers all, making prescription savings effortless. 

Using Visory is simple, just download the app and show our discount card at your pharmacy. No need to sign up or clip coupons! Visit our preferred pharmacy partners including Kroger, Ralphs, King Soopers, Smith’s, Mariano’s and more.


Life can get complex, but saving money on prescription drugs at your local pharmacy can be simple! Visory Health streamlines your savings experience and lowers your prescription costs, so you have more time and money to enjoy the things you love.

Join millions of satisfied customers who saved over 1.3 billion dollars using the Visory Health Rx card.

Visory Health provides prescription discounts with or without insurance, ensuring you don't overpay for medications or struggle with confusing coupons and physical RX cards. Find the most accurate prescription drug prices, and show the Visory Health discount card app to your pharmacist. It's entirely free, and your whole family (including pets) can benefit from the savings.

Steps to use your Rx & Prescription Discount:

- Download Visory Health App and add the digital prescription card to your Google Pay Account.
- Ask about Visory Health at participating local pharmacy locations.
- Look up the most accurate prescription rx drug prices and save.

Download Visory now, discover the best Rx drug prices in your area, and enjoy fantastic discounts on your prescriptions!

Visory customers are raving about their prescription savings:

"I saved $50 on my medication using Visory! My pharmacy tried both insurance and Visory, and the savings were amazing." –Rachel, Visory Customer, Maryville, TN

"I've been on the same blood pressure medication for years, and the price recently increased to $44 a month. Visory lowered it to $15 – I'm so grateful!" - Kevin, Visory Customer, Littleton, CO

"My company switched to a high deductible plan, and my medication costs skyrocketed. The Visory Card drastically reduced my costs, and I couldn't be happier." – Allana, Visory Customer, Plano, TX

For Pharmacists:
Visory Health app is an exceptional tool to find the lowest prescription drug costs for your customers. Help them unlock prescription savings at Kroger Pharmacy, Walmart, Sam's Club, Walgreens & more local pharmacies with our exclusive discounts.

Preferred pharmacy locations: Kroger, Ralphs, FredMyer, QFC, Fry’s, Smith’s, King Soopers, CityMarket, Dillons, Baker’s, Gerbes, JayC, Pay Less Super Markets, Harris Teeter, Mariano’s, Metro Market, Pick’n Save.
